title: BAFTA Award winners and nominees
abstract: Short film and short animation BAFTA award nominees and winners.
description: A selection of award-nominated and award-winning films from the British Short Film and British Short Animation categories. Both awards are presented annually by BAFTA, the British Academy of Film and Television Arts. The Academy recognises that it is essential to reward and nurture the immense diversity and talent demonstrated by established and emerging filmmakers producing short film and animation.
